title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4041 - Racing Colors And Numbers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4041 - Racing Colors And Numbers

State Regulations
§ 4041.1 - Colors registered with The Jockey Club
§ 4041.2 - Permission required to run horse in deviate colors
§ 4041.3 - Numbers on saddle cloth
§ 4041.4 - Posting deviation in colors
§ 4041.5 - Horses not in owner's colors
§ 4041.6 - Wearing of advertising or promotional material

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4041

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128, 212-a; L. 1982, ch. 865, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
